reviewText: great way to tell the bible stories for the younger kids. My grandchildren loved watching the movie. Planning to buy more of the dvds. Charles Heston did a great job telling these stories.
Title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible - The Miracles of Jesus

reviewText: I highly recommend this video. I used it as a Bible Study tool for my nieces and nephew. It held their attention.
Title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible - The Miracles of Jesus

reviewText: I've been going through several different series of Biblical DVD's for my toddler, so that he can get a better understanding of the stories in the Bible.  Content-wise, this is the best DVD series I have found.  It doesn't have time-traveling children as one series does and the story is closely in line with the Bible.  It begins with a several minute opening from Charlton Heston, then gets into the story.Unfortunately, it is a little too advanced for a 2.5 year old.  I would definitely recommend it though for an older child because of the amount of talking and slower pace of the story line.
Title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible - The Miracles of Jesus

reviewText: This DVD production of the story of Jesus has accomplished exactly what I had hoped for my 3yr old son: an interest in learning about the Lord, His involvement in the lives of those who trust Him, and His love and miracles.  My son often recites (in surprising detail) various scenes from the tale.  One of my fellow brothers in Christ calls my son "The Little Preacher" because my son enjoys capturing the attention of those around him so he can retell the story of Jesus.  I understand some reviewing this telling of the story may prefer stricter adherence to various nuances and literary exactness from Scripture - I can appreciate that as I am a literal believer of Scripture.  There is never a perfect retelling of any Biblical story that will appeal to everyone's preference.  As already mentioned, this achieved what I had hoped for my son: help him develop an interest in learning about the Lord, begin building a faith in the Lord, and recognizing a need for relationship with Jesus in his own life.
Title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible - The Miracles of Jesus

reviewText: With a Charlton Heston introduction this DVD is a pleasant collection of Jesus's miracles.  This DVD is similar to the animated old testament collection of stories.  Both were enjoyable.
summary: A very good animated Bible Series
Title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible - The Miracles of Jesus

reviewText: Excellent dvd about the miracles of Jesus. Would be a good teaching tool for Sunday school, Bible class, etc. Perfect for small ones and those who lack or loss the ability to read. Animated characters are more attention getting than real life for some people.
Title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible - The Miracles of Jesus
